dc:title: On Pilgrimage: First Visit to Soviet Russia
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes her trip to Poland and the Russian cities of Leningrad and Moscow where she visits museums, Churches, and cemeteries. Visits the grave of Dostoevsky and debates with a group of Soviet writers about the works of Solzhenitisn. Notes his role in keeping faith in God alive in Russia through his writings. (Continued in Document #515.)
